titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 749) to reauthorize Federal support for passenger rail programs, and for other purposes, and providing for proceedings during the period from March 6, 2015, through March 13, 2015.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 749) to reauthorize Federal support for passenger rail programs, and for other purposes, and providing for proceedings during the period from March 6, 2015, through March 13, 2015.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-36, by Mr. Woodall.
Resolution also provides for proceedings of the House during the period from March 4, 2015 through March 13, 2015.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 13.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 134.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 749) to reauthorize Federal support for passenger rail programs, and for other purposes, and providing for proceedings during the period from March 6, 2015, through March 13, 2015.
